41.eng-name: The Book of al-Fara' and al-'Atirah

hadiths.text: Ibn 'Abbas said:"The Prophet passed by a sheep belonging to Maimunah that had died and said: 'Why don't you take its skin and tan it and make use of it'?

chapter.eng-name: The Skin Of Dead Animals (Those Not Slaughtered Or Killed Properly)
